languages.text: Мертвый корабль, еще недавно заполненный небольшой колонией реколлигеров, застыл в оглушительной тишине космоса. Более никто не копошится в его железных кишках — быть может, такого его истинное посмертие?

traits.locale_text: Мертвый корабль, еще недавно заполненный небольшой колонией реколлигеров, застыл в оглушительной тишине космоса. Более никто не копошится в его железных кишках — быть может, такого его истинное посмертие?

languages.text: The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?
languages.original_text: Мертвый корабль, еще недавно заполненный небольшой колонией реколлигеров, застыл в оглушительной тишине космоса. Более никто не копошится в его железных кишках — быть может, такого его истинное посмертие?

traits.locale_text: The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Nobody is crawling through its iron guts anymore. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?
The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Nobody is crawling through its iron guts anymore. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?
The empty ship that recently housed a small Recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?
The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?
The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?

languages.text: 那艘空荡荡的飞船中，不久前还安置着一座小小的回收专员殖民地，如今只剩下一片死寂。没有任何活着的灵魂能再次在它钢铁的肚肠中爬进爬出。或许，这就是它注定的死亡？
languages.original_text: The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?

traits.locale_text: 那艘空荡荡的飞船中，不久前还安置着一座小小的回收专员殖民地，如今只剩下一片死寂。没有任何活着的灵魂能再次在它钢铁的肚肠中爬进爬出。或许，这就是它注定的死亡？

languages.text: 小さな回収業者のコロニーを乗せていた空の船は、死の静寂に包まれていた。その鉄の腹の中を這い回る魂は、やはりひとりもいない。もしかしたら、これが本当に運命づけられた死後の世界なのだろうか？
languages.original_text: The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?

traits.locale_text: 小さな回収業者のコロニーを乗せていた空の船は、死の静寂に包まれていた。その鉄の腹の中を這い回る魂は、やはりひとりもいない。もしかしたら、これが本当に運命づけられた死後の世界なのだろうか？

languages.text: La nave vacía que hace poco albergaba una pequeña colonia de recolectores yace inmóvil en el silencio sepulcral del espacio. Ni un alma se arrastra aún por sus entrañas de hierro. ¿Quizás sea éste su destino?
languages.original_text: The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?

traits.locale_text: La nave vacía que hace poco albergaba una pequeña colonia de recolectores yace inmóvil en el silencio sepulcral del espacio. Ni un alma se arrastra aún por sus entrañas de hierro. ¿Quizás sea éste su destino?

languages.text: Das leere Schiff, das vor kurzem noch eine kleine Recolliger-Kolonie beherbergt hat, liegt reglos in der toten Stille des Raums. Keine Seele kriecht mehr durch seine eisernen Eingeweide. Vielleicht ist das wirklich das Jenseits, zu dem es bestimmt ist?
languages.original_text: The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?

traits.locale_text: Das leere Schiff, das vor kurzem noch eine kleine Recolliger-Kolonie beherbergt hat, liegt reglos in der toten Stille des Raums. Keine Seele kriecht mehr durch seine eisernen Eingeweide. Vielleicht ist das wirklich das Jenseits, zu dem es bestimmt ist?

languages.text: Le vaisseau désert qui abritait encore récemment une colonie de récupérateurs dérive dans le silence de mort du vide intersidéral. Il n'y a plus âme qui vive dans ses entrailles de métal. Peut-être est-ce là l'éternité qui lui était promise.
languages.original_text: The empty ship that recently housed a small recolliger colony lies still in the dead silence of space. Not a soul still crawls through its iron guts. Perhaps this truly is its destined afterlife?

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau désert qui abritait encore récemment une colonie de récupérateurs dérive dans le silence de mort du vide intersidéral. Il n'y a plus âme qui vive dans ses entrailles de métal. Peut-être est-ce là l'éternité qui lui était promise.
